sources.title: Ivan's Childhood | WAR MOVIE | with Spanish subtitles
sources.description:
Basado en la historia de V. Bogomolov "Ivan". La infancia de Iván, de 12 años, termina con el inicio de la guerra. Sin padres, va a una unidad militar y se convierte en explorador, arriesgando su vida, obteniendo información sobre el enemigo. Victoria. Derrotó a Berlín. Pero Iván nunca volvió de la última misión...

Calificación IMDb: 8,0

Año de producción: 1962

Dirigida por: Andrei Tarkovsky
Escrito por: Mikhail Papava, Vladimir Bogomolov
Música: Vyacheslav Ovchinnikov
Operador: Yusov Vadim
Diseño de producción: Evgeniy Chernyaev

Empezando por: Grinko Nikolay, Burlyaev Nikolai, Zubkov Valentin, Zharikov Evgeny, Krylov Stepan, Malyavina Valentina, Milyutenko Dmitry, Tarkovsky Irina (Irma)

sources.title: Ivan's Childhood | WAR MOVIE | directed by Andrey Tarkovsky
sources.description:
Based on the story by V. Bogomolov "Ivan". The childhood of 12-year-old Ivan ends with the onset of the war. Left without parents, he goes to a military unit and becomes a scout, risking his life, getting information about the enemy. Victory. Defeated Berlin. But Ivan never returned from the last assignment...

IMDb rating: 8,0

Year of production: 1962

Directed by: Andrey Tarkovsky
Written by: Mikhail Papava, Vladimir Bogomolov
Music: Vyacheslav Ovchinnikov
Operator: Yusov Vadim
Production Designer: Evgeniy Chernyaev

Starting by: Grinko Nikolay, Burlyaev Nikolai, Zubkov Valentin, Zharikov Evgeny, Krylov Stepan, Malyavina Valentina, Milyutenko Dmitry, Tarkovsky Irina (Irma)

metadata.Plot: During World War II, 12-year old Ivan works as a spy on the eastern front. The small Ivan can cross the German lines unnoticed to collect information. Three Soviet officers try to take care of this boy-child.
metadata.Writer: Vladimir Bogomolov, Mikhail Papava, Andrei Konchalovsky
metadata.Actors: Nikolay Burlyaev, Valentin Zubkov, Evgeniy Zharikov

relatedMovies.title: Hemingway's Adventures of a Young Man
